About Me

I’m Pranay, and I’m an Android Engineer, living in Ahmedabad.

I write stuff at booleancoder.com and Medium. I am a part of the Android team at Simform

I mainly write about Android, Kotlin, and Firebase. Some time on other technical stuff too!

As an Android developer, love to write and teaching about Android App Development.

I always love to prepares food in my leisure time.

You can always find me @pranaypatel_ on Twitter for twitting about Android and other technical things.

Project And Apps

 Projects and Apps


1. KarConnect: KarConnect is a real time vehicle diagnosis & driving behavior monitoring platform. The KarConnect (OBD II) device helps you to understand the health of your car. The app gives you the details about the driving behavior as well as the faults or defects in your vehicle. Single app for multiple vehicles. The app allows you track your vehicle and driving behavior in real-time. You can selfdiagnose your vehicle for any issue in just single click of your app. KarConnect is an initiative to make your driving not only smart but safe. ‘Safety first’ is the motive of this very ingenious product Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.karconnect.android.pro Website: https://www.karconnect.com/


2. Way by Way.Com: Way app is the huge product I have ever worked on. Way contains different modules like Dining, Parking, Sports and Movies. Dining modules contains functionality to search restaurants and its offers. user can search nearby restaurants and book them. The main functionality of this app is, user can order food online using the app. Parking module is for airport parking. user can search available parking and book them online for airport parking. The main feature of the parking is the parking owners who provide free shuttle service can be seen real time in Shuttle tracking module. Visitors can track shuttle in real time which is made using socket. Sports and Movies module is to book sport events and movie tickets. User can see offers for movie tickets and sport events. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=way.com Website: https://www.way.com/


3. Bindle Description: I managed this project as a ‘Project Lead’ to manage Web team and Mobile team to deliver the complete project with all its milestones on time. Bindle is your go-to on-demand moving buddy that guarantees your items are moved at the price you want. Post what you want to move and watch as vetted Bindle Pros in your area bid on your job. Choose which Bindle Pro to use based on price, vehicle type and rating. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bindle.android Website: https://www.getbindle.com/


4. Nextech GPS: The App provides seamless and cost effective tracking solutions for global tracking and fleet management. By using our GPS devices in the vehicles and configuring them with our application, you can do real time tracking for the vehicle. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nt.app Website: http://www.nextechinfoway.com/


5. MedCheck: MedCheck App connects to MedCheck blood pressure monitors and blood glucose monitors via Bluetooth. It records medication, height, weight, and other notes, to make sense of disjointed data so users can start to play an active role in their own healthcare. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.getmedcheck Website: https://www.getmedcheck.com/


6. Bangin Video Dating: Video profiles dating app. Simply swipe on the profiles to indicate your interest & when you match, take the conversation in the direction you would like. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.banglabs.bangin


7. Autocroc Vehicle marketplace: The official Android app from Autocroc – Buy and Sell Everything Auto With Autocroc it is quickly & easily to BUY and SELL vehicles, vehicle parts & vehicle services for FREE with our simple to use category and search features. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.insaneye.autocroc Website: http://www.autocroc.com/


8. Via Digital ID: Via Digital Id is Autonomous Contact Book. With Via, you will never have to update your contacts again. With an ever-expanding number of contacts, friends, and family to keep informed, a change in your contact information leads to the daunting task of relaying the changes to lots of people. Via is simple in that it negates the dread of having to notify thousands of people of a change in phone number, email, or home address. Via is the app to use when updating contact information—for you and your friends and search features. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.via.android Website: http://theviaapp.com/


9. BloodMonk : LetsNurture has come out with a blood donor android application for the users. This new application is named as the “Blood Monk”, and helps users to not only find names of blood donors in the city on time but also find information on the nearest hospital in less time. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.letsnurture.bloodmonk


10. eZeal game: The app is loaded with games, activity books, animated videos, the bible and much more. Play Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.zeal.app


11. Waysay sdk: Waysay android SDK can be easily integrated into an existing app. You can Show feed and notification of nearby events, promotions etc. based on users location or if a user enters in beacon range placed in a specific location. Dynamically set feed enable, disable based on user interest. A user can comment on feed, like and share feed. change app theme and feed action (like or comment, share, and other web links) dynamically set by user from admin side. App using Waysay sdk: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.waysay.eattoperform


12. Roundr App: Roundr is a simple-to-use mobile app (desktop version incoming) that links Estate Agents to their sellers, and other agents in real time for fast scheduling, feedback to clients, and accurate record keeping and reporting. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.roundr.app

  • Service: Android Development
